Title: Provides for a transfer fee of 75% of the fair market value in dissolution or sales of a rental project or mutual company
Summary: Provides for a transfer fee of 75% of the fair market value in dissolution or sales of a rental project or mutual company.
LawCode: Amd ยง35, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to windfall profits on the dissolution or first sale of rental companies and the dissolution and/or reconstitution of mutual companies
